trans-unit.resname: F01·6 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swords to Plowshares
trans-unit.target: Swords to Plowshares

trans-unit.resname: F01·6 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

trans-unit.resname: F01·6 | Swords to Plowshares | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: Ophidian
trans-unit.target: Ophidian

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, CARDNAME assigns no combat damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, CARDNAME assigns no combat damage this turn.

trans-unit.source: "I will ... tell thee more than thou hast wit to ask."\n—Christopher Marlowe, *Doctor Faustus*
trans-unit.target: "I will ... tell thee more than thou hast wit to ask."\n—Christopher Marlowe, *Doctor Faustus*

trans-unit.source: Jackal Pup
trans-unit.target: Jackal Pup

trans-unit.resname: F01·8 | Jackal Pup | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

trans-unit.source: "Cry havoc and let slip the dogs of war."\n—William Shakespeare, *Julius Caesar*
trans-unit.target: "Cry havoc and let slip the dogs of war."\n—William Shakespeare, *Julius Caesar*

trans-unit.source: Quirion Ranger
trans-unit.target: Quirion Ranger

trans-unit.resname: F01·9 | Quirion Ranger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate only once each turn.

trans-unit.source: "I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately."\n—Henry David Thoreau, *Walden*
trans-unit.target: "I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately."\n—Henry David Thoreau, *Walden*

trans-unit.source: Carnophage
trans-unit.target: Carnophage

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap CARDNAME unless you pay 1 life.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap CARDNAME unless you pay 1 life.

trans-unit.source: "And in their blind and unattaining state their miserable lives have sunk so low that they must envy every other fate."\n—Dante, *Inferno*, trans. Ciardi
trans-unit.target: "And in their blind and unattaining state their miserable lives have sunk so low that they must envy every other fate."\n—Dante, *Inferno*, trans. Ciardi

trans-unit.source: Impulse
trans-unit.target: Impulse

trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.source: Fireblast
trans-unit.target: Fireblast

trans-unit.source: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to any target.
